body:
Comment 2: 
The code is fine.  It's OK for the compiler to assume that signed overflow does not
exist in this case.  I assume that you are passing the options -pipe -O3
-floop-interchange -ftree-loop-distribution -floop-strip-mine -floop-block
-ftree-vectorize yourself, since the dist program does not use those by default.  Since
we are converting the programs to Go in any case, I don't think this is worth fixing.
_Status changed to **WontFix**._
